item.title: Winter Olympics 2026...
item.description: February 7, 2026 - Major clashes erupted in Milan at protests surrounding the Winter Olympics hosted in Italy. Around 10,000 people marched toward the Olympic site. The demonstrators protested the participation of US and Israeli athletes, environmental damage of the Winter Olympics and the presence of US ICE agents. *Edit to add more context from fellow Imgurian @draconyum " The media over here are saying protesters were shooting rockets straight at the olympic site but this protest and the footage of this video are taken in Corvetto, a small city 2 kilometres away from the Olympic site, personally I highly doubt these "rockets" would be able to fly for 2 kilometres, what I'm saying is even the media is trying to make protesters be seen as terrorists"

item.title: She was never seen again
item.description:
She was never seen again after (this most horrid) detailed account of child sex abuse (2019!!!) that was witnessed by this super model GABRIELA JIMENEZ on trumpstein Island. What happened on this remote island is beyond horrific — this is worse than what writers of horror-fiction can make up. DEEPLY DISTURBING ꜱʜᴇ ᴡᴀꜱ ɴᴇᴠᴇʀ ꜱᴇᴇɴ ᴀɢᴀɪɴ And to think these are the leaders around the world — sickening. This was seven years ago. Don't you remember? I don't :( This is so much worse than I can stomach. *REPOST of lastweek's @MithrandirGi — spread the word.
trimp has over 5000 mentions, making trimp the worst/best sex offender PEDO champion of the world. This is your president :/ Watch as the avalanche of names being released begins to unfold.

item.title: Mr. StonedLikeICheckedOutMedusa & I had a hard talk tonight
item.description: I’m known as the spider queen on here, but there’s some more depth to my life and experiences I was a 31B (military police) in the Army National Guard; I got out in 2016 thank fuck. Fwiw, I’m embarrassed of my service and deeply regret it now. But it nevertheless gave me specialized skills, knowledge, instincts, etc that the average person doesn’t have I’m a purple belt in Brazilian Jiu Jitsu. For the last 7 years I’ve been teaching women’s self-defense seminars and classes, as well as attending and assistant teaching safe protest seminars. Again- another unique skill set that most people lack ICE is in my city now, chat. They’ve rented out a whole hotel in Indianapolis for at least a month. And it caused a very, very hard conversation between Mr. StonedLikeICheckedOutMedusa and me. Arrest? No biggie; we can swing that. But I begged him to please not hate me if I *died* doing the right thing. I could never, ever stand on the sidelines and watch violence happen- I wouldn’t be able to live with myself when I have the true skills to help But ICE has shown they’ll kill you just for helping someone stand up….I can’t believe we’re at this fucking point. #sad #love #relatable #ice
item.dc:creator: stonedlikeicheckedoutmedusa

27 Man Tax: James Spader
“No more yanky my wanky. The Donger need food!” - Long Duk Dong So, I made a discord server. It's a relaxed environment where you can take/donate memes to the cause, play trivia twice a week, chat about lots of topics or about nothing at all. We also have Jack Box game night and are setting up movie night! Very laid back/relaxed vibe. Come hang with us. https://discord.gg/AWFV7FT3RQ I'm also on the imgcat server for updates & fun: https://discord.gg/TpjD37jgJ9 ***Also if you miss abbiistabbii's discord community good news! Here's the new one https://discord.gg/NPStJGgARq - where everyone's reconnecting, shitposting, and hanging out again*** https://ko-fi.com/mememuseumcurator Unable to work, zero income. Feel free to leave me a tip. Those that have, y'all are the bee's knees. You've honestly been my lifeline. ***Tag me if you see an artist/creator you like whose work isn't getting seen as much as it should be! Or if you are an artist/creator and want me to post something of yours, DM me

item.title: GovBrief Today #374
item.description: Democrats have five days to negotiate ICE reforms before the only leverage they have disappears until fall. ICE already has years of funding from last summer's OBBBA. But other DHS agencies including the Coast Guard, TSA, and Secret Service still don't have funding past Friday. Democrats put 10 demands on the table including body cameras, no masks, judicial warrants, and no raids at schools. House Minority Leader Hakeem Jeffries says Republicans haven't responded. The Trump administration will almost certainly require those 135,000 DHS employees to work without pay. Most Americans won't feel this shutdown like last fall’s. But for those workers and their families, Friday starts the clock on choosing between their car payment or their credit card bill. Consider how you might cope if your next paycheck simply didn't arrive. That's what Republicans are gambling with by refusing to come to the table on ICE's wildly unpopular attacks on Americans. Call your reps now. Tell Republicans to stop gambling with federal paychecks and start negotiating. Tell Democrats you've got their backs on all ten demands. We've emailed 6,000+ stories over 374 straight nights. The algorithm doesn't always show them to you. Subscribe now at govbrief.today #GovBriefToday #Resist Subscribe (It's Free!) - https://gbounacos.substack.com [1] https://go.govbrief.today/trump-hunter-hess [2] https://go.govbrief.today/oz-vaccinate [3] https://go.govbrief.today/maxwell-deposition [4] https://go.govbrief.today/jeffries-ice-demands [5] https://go.govbrief.today/trump-bad-bunny [6] https://go.govbrief.today/trump-donor-access Subscribe (It's Free!) - https://gbounacos.substack.com
item.dc:creator: GeorgeBounacos

item.title: I made a thing aka, screw Ring/Nest "subs"
item.description:
Link to code: https://github.com/sonic-jpeg/rpi5-tapo-motion-recorder I recently got 2 ip cams from TP-Link. I chose them because I knew you could access their video streams over LAN with rtsp. You can access these streams without a subscription, unlike the big names like Ring/Nest. They're also $15/each, you know, not $100 >.> TP-Link /does/ have sub if you want "cloud" storage, but with free access to the rtsp streams, I can just host my own "cloud", with blackjack and hookers (and avoid sending video to tp-link) I could just dump the streams to my NAS, as is, and I was at first, but then I decided to only record during motion events. TP-Link has a motion detection feature in their app, but there is no way I could find to access it over LAN. So I decided to write my own motion detection system, built for the RPi5. Tapo cams have a low quality and high quality stream. You can access both simultaneously. I'm using the low quality stream for motion detection and recording the high quality stream during motion events. ffmpeg opens the low quality stream, decodes each frame on the GPU, applies a custom vulkan shader that converts the frame to grayscale, applies a small blur to reduce noise, and compares it against the previous grey-blur-frame. Pixels whose difference exceeds a threshold are marked as motion. This produces single-channel threshold modified motion mask frames. These motion frames are pumped into a lightweight C state machine (with some ARM optimizations) that computes aggregate activity metrics over time. Motion is only declared when activity exceeds configurable thresholds for a sustained period, helping suppress false positives from noise, compression artifacts, or brief lighting changes. Recording starts on confirmed motion and stops only after activity remains low for a configurable cooldown. I'm handling ffmpeg process orchestration in python and just piping stdout into the C state machine. This /could/ all be done in C but I'm not experienced with linux's C API for subprocesses. PS: Before you say anything, yes, I could setup some kind of IoT motion sensor and send reports over LAN to the pi. I could, but I didn't ;) Also, yes tp-link means CHINA. They're cheap and reliable, and all of their shortcomings can be addressed with proper network security. I really don't want this to be a debate about chinese companies spying on you, pls. Or do debate it and I'll just look the other way, I'm not your supervisor ¯\_(ツ)_/¯ Disclaimer: I had a few different motivators that lead to /this/ solution. I don't claim it to be the /best/ solution. I wanted to share because it took a lot of research to get each part working, especially figuring out how to use custom vulkan shaders with the libplacebo ffmpeg filter. Maybe it will be useful for others to see a working example, publicly on the web ;) Thanks for coming to my TED talk, have a cat
Cat tax
item.dc:creator: SonicTheHedgehog2
